Sic Bo, Bingo, Jungle Scratch, Plinko    ICO - Pig World Shared Coin https://pig.world/ico  We don't want to ICO is only a ICO. if you keep the PICOs and you can receive the Pig World plan's net profit .  Pig World will issue Pig World Stock Coin (PICOs token) through ICO to support the system development and expenses, and to use the security funds as PICO currency guarantees. In addition, the token holders who participate in the Pig World ICO plan will receive a part of the Pig World plan's net profit (total profit - total cost) after the service goes online.      What we are different from our competitors? We have 3 main competitor(FunFair, DAO.Casino, Edgeless), but our casino still:  More simpler in Platform of Architecture. More quicker in Register. More faster in Loading Game. More transparent in core. No fluctuate of price in Chips.    Mission We want to a simple casino platform with the multi player and state blockchain game, not only guess big or small.  The platform adopts hybrid architecture. Instead of interacting directly with smart contract, players sign the betting records with a private key and send to Pig World. Then the Pig World will upload all at once. Therefore, players do not need to pay Gas fee and taxes for any bets and awards.    PG channels So, Player can get the game result immediately through PG channels and then Pig World will upload them at batch.  PG Channels is an Off-Chain technique. Using the Hash function & cryptosystem to generate a unpredictable random In the process of channel establishment. Most important of all, it sill give consideration to safety, privacy and fairness. PG Channels’s conception come from ethereum scalability layer (State Channels).     Pig World Coin A PICO have fixed price $0.033, pico only use in casino, can't transfer, only buy & sell with Pig World.  The value fluctuation of the virtual currency will affect the player's willingness to play. Therefore, Pig World sets the fixed exchange rate of the PICO is USD 0.033 and provides the equivalent virtual currency as a depository. This means that you can exchange PICO back to the equivalent virtual currency at any time on the official website. Pig World will also increase or decrease PICO circulation with market activity.
